snippet: The company cited a legal dispute with federal regulators over the safety of the novelties, which are made from powerful rare-earth magnets.
abstract: Maxfield & Oberton Holdings, maker of popular magnetic toy Buckyballs, announces that it will stop selling them due to legal and public relations dispute with Consumer Product Safety Commission.
lead_paragraph: The company cited a legal dispute with federal regulators over the safety of the novelties, which are made from powerful rare-earth magnets.

headline.seo: Maker of Buckyballs Says It Will Stop Selling Them
headline.main: Safety Worry Leads to End of a Popular Toy Magnet
headline.print_headline: Safety Worry Leads to End Of a Popular Toy Magnet
